description:
A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once


Hi again!
This is another small release to sort out more bugs with 10.0.0 and 10.0.1 as well as some longer standing issues!
Fixed
- Check that mouse press is inside view rectangle of CheckComboBox by @Octol1ttle in #4681
- Disable tooltips if using gamescope / Steam Deck. by @mdeneen in #4096
- Fix environment variables always being discarded and custom commands always being overriden by @TheKodeToad in #4718
- Fix shaderpacks folder being hidden by @TheKodeToad in #4707
- Skip asking for offline name when using offline account by @Octol1ttle in #4680
- fix curseforge import by @Trial97 in #4699
- fix jpg icons by @Trial97 in #4706
- fix modrinth environments filter by @Trial97 in #4704
Removed
- remove curseforge api key validation by @Trial97 in #4700
- various demons from the codebase
